formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Activity-based bandwidth (download or upload): \[ B_{\text{req}} = \frac{\alpha}{\eta}\; \Big( c \cdot \sum_{i=1}^{N} n_i \, r_i \Big) \] where \(n_i\) is users on activity \(i\), \(r_i\) its bitrate (Mbps), \(c\) the concurrency (0–1), \(\eta\) protocol efficiency (0–1), and \(\alpha\) the safety margin (1+margin). File transfer time: \[ t = \frac{S_{\text{bits}}}{R_{\text{link}} \cdot \eta} \quad,\quad S_{\text{bits}} = S \times \kappa \] with \(S\) the file size, \(\kappa\) the unit factor (e.g., \(1\text{ GB}=10^9\) bytes), \(R_{\text{link}}\) in bits/s, and \(\eta\) efficiency.
